channel.title: A newbie question about logging in
channel.description:
I just downloaded the Moparscape client (along with the recent java and the JDK) and I loaded moparscape however everytime I go to start server then I create an account this happens in the black box:
[01:45:25] Server : 127.0.0.1 [01:45:25] [01:45:25] [01:45:25] Loaded 0 random handlers [01:45:25] # Loading controllers Server: Starting HybridScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [01:45:41] Couldn't open output stream to log file Testaccount-20101128.log [01:45:41] [01:45:41] Logging into (Testaccount, *****) [01:45:41] Your UID is: 51397987 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:55918 Registering user testaccount with pass testing Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client testaccount disconnected. [01:45:43] Couldn't open output stream to log file Testaccount-20101128.log [01:45:43] [01:45:43] Logging into (Testaccount, *****) [01:45:43] Your UID is: 89643854 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:55919 Did not save for testaccount Server: ClientHandler: Client testaccount disconnected.
and in yellow it says my account is already in use. I have windows 7 (I read its bad for mopar but its what I got...) 32 bit. May someone help me?

item.title: A newbie question about logging in
item.dc:creator: @Insaniac Insaniac
item.description:

and in yellow it says my account is already in use. I have windows 7 (I read its bad for mopar but its what I gotâ€¦) 32 bit. May someone help me?
